fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Idolize (Day, 1 use): Select a player, ask them if they wish to become your sidekick. If they accept, their goal switches to "The Hero and their allies must be the last players standing". If they decline, they are modkilled on the spot. This ability fails if your target is an evil faction or convert immune.

fields.name: Performance of the Lifetime (Night, 2 uses):
fields.value: Send your Sidekick out to kill a player, for all intents and purposes, the sidekicks visit is indirect.

fields.name: 2-For-2 (Blood Moon):
fields.value: Send your sidekick out to kill two players, if you do not have a sidekick, a randomly convertable role will become the sidekick. Blood Moon only.
